data.title: Amino Acid-Based Formula
data.meta_description: Neocate Junior with Prebiotics is the first and only hypoallergenic, nutritionally complete amino acid-based formula with prebiotics to help support digestive health. Buy now.
data.text:
Directions for Preparation and Use:

The amount of Neocate to take should be determined by a healthcare professional and is dependent on the age, body weight and medical condition of the patient. Neocate® Junior provides complete or supplemental nutritional support for children over 1 year of age. Use under medical supervision. For oral and tube feeding only; not for parenteral use.

For oral or tube feeding:

Measure the required amount of warm or cool water into a container.

Add the prescribed amount of Neocate® Junior to the water.

Stir, or cover and shake, until the powder has dissolved.

If taken orally, Neocate® Junior is best served chilled. Once feeding begins, use within 1 hour or discard.

The recommended standard dilution is 30 kcal/fl oz. This can be achieved by mixing 1 unpacked, level scoop of powder to each fluid ounce of water, as in the following table:

NEOCATE® JUNIOR FLAVOR Amount of Water to Add AMOUNT OF NEOCATE® JUNIOR POWDER Final Volume Unflavored without Prebiotics (1 scoop = 7.3 g) 4 fl oz 4 scoops or 29.2 g 4.7 fl oz 7 fl oz 7 scoops or 51.1 g 8.2 fl oz 21 fl oz 21 scoops or 153 g 24.6 fl oz Vanilla (1 scoop = 7.3 g) 4 fl oz 4 scoops or 29.2 g 4.7 fl oz 7 fl oz 7 scoops or 51.1 g 8.2 fl oz 21 fl oz 21 scoops or 153 g 24.6 fl oz Strawberry (1 scoop = 7.3 g) 4 fl oz 4 scoops or 29.2 g 4.7 fl oz 7 fl oz 7 scoops or 51.1 g 8.2 fl oz 21 fl oz 21 scoops or 153 g 24.6 fl oz Tropical (1 scoop = 7.3 g) 4 fl oz 4 scoops or 29.2 g 4.7 fl oz 7 fl oz 7 scoops or 51.1 g 8.2 fl oz 21 fl oz 21 scoops or 153 g 24.6 fl oz Chocolate (1 scoop = 7.5 g) 4 fl oz 4 scoops or 30.0 g 4.7 fl oz 7 fl oz 7 scoops or 52.5 g 8.3 fl oz 21 fl oz 21 scoops or 158 g 24.9 fl oz

One can Unflavored (without prebiotics) makes approx. 64 fl oz; Vanilla and Strawberry approx. 63 fl oz; Chocolate approx. 61 fl oz; Tropical approx. 60 fl oz.
